member.name: T:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras
member.summary: Represents extra services for GanttChartView component.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.GetExtras(DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartView)
member.summary: Returns the extra service object associated to the specified component instance.
member.param: The component instance to return the extra service object for.
member.returns: The extra service object associated to the specified component instance.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.Export
member.summary: Exports an image for the grid and Gantt Chart represented by the GanttChartView component instance associated to this service object, allowing the end user to specify the file name and type.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.Export(System.String)
member.summary: Exports an image for the grid and Gantt Chart represented by the GanttChartView component instance associated to this service object, to the specified file.
member.param: Identifies the file and type to export the image to.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.PageSetup
member.summary: Displays the Page Setup dialog allowing the end user to set up the document to print.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.PrintPreview
member.summary: Displays the Print Preview dialog allowing the end user to view the document as it would print.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.Print
member.summary: Prints the grid and Gantt Chart represented by the GanttChartView component instance associated to this service object, allowing the end user to select the printer and configure printed document settings.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.Print(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prints the grid and Gantt Chart represented by the GanttChartView component instance associated to this service object, allowing the end user to select the printer and configure printed document settings before the actual operation starts if the specified parameter is true.
member.param: Indicates whether the end user is allowed to select the printer and configure printed document settings before the actual operation starts.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.Columns
member.summary: Allows specifying the list of column names to filter when exporting or printing the content of the GanttChartView component associated to this service object. When not set or set to null, no column filter would apply. The default value is null.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.PrintDocument
member.summary: Provides a PrintDocument object that you can supplementary configure before actually printing the content of the GanttChartView component associated to this service object.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.GridWidth
member.summary: Gets the width of the grid associated to the Gantt Chart of the GanttChartView component.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.GanttWidth
member.summary: Gets the width of the Gantt Chart of the GanttChartView component.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.ContentWidth
member.summary: Gets the combined width of the content displayed by the grid and Gantt Chart of the GanttChartView component.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.ContentHeight
member.summary: Gets the height of the content displayed by the GanttChartView component.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.ProjectDataControlLibrary.GanttChartViewExtras.ProjectStart
member.summary: Gets the start date and time of the project displayed by the GanttChartView component.
